original: intros m x y i j Hinv Hp Hiter Hexpf Hj Hi. assert (Hy0 : y0 = Iter (cF m) j x) by auto. apply cF_L1_y0_x in Hy0 as Hx_eq. - apply cF_L1_x_y0 in Hiter as Hiter_eq. ++ rewrite Hiter_eq in Hx_eq. apply eq_sym in Hx_eq. rewrite Iter_add in Hj. apply Iter_inj with (i := i) (j := dx - 1) in Hx_eq. * rewrite Nat.add_comm in Hx_eq. rewrite <- Hx_eq. symmetry. apply cF_L1_y0_x. all: auto. * omega. ++ omega. - auto. - auto.
